item.title: A Hologram for the King
item.description: One pleasurable cinematic experience was the movie A Hologram for the King by Tom Tykwer. Tom Hanks stars as an ageing sales agent, who is sent to Saudi Arabia for a pitch of a virtual reality conference system. He finds himself with his fellow colleages in a tent in the desert, the king far away and probably never coming. I really enjoyed watching it and can recommend it.
